page.title: 07Wetwang,Shopping
page.content:
In our village there are no food shops.There is a garage and that sells sweets,crisps etc.We also have two pubs one is called the{Victoria}and the other is called the{Black Swan. They both sell sweets as well as alcohol.We have an Antique shop as well and that is called{Wold Antiques. We have a wood shop and they make furniture and things like that and it is called{Oak Rabbit Crafts.We have another shop and that shop sells wrought iron and it is called{The Old {Granary.
I think that we ought to have a food shop because we have to go to Driffield to buy our food.It is especially difficult for old people to travel up to Driffield every week.
